attributes.action: indefinite leave to remain for those 2.5 years and beyond living in the UK
attributes.additional_details: With uncertainty to when this pandemic will end, many people are awaiting to be legalised, will be applying for extension and it’s very daunting. With job loss and people particularly from non eu migrating to uk. I think it’s only fair and humane that they are granted indefinite stay in this country to feel secure, supported by the government. Let’s have mercy.
attributes.background: Covid-19 is creating a new normal for all citizens. I want the UK government to grant citizenship/indefinite leave to remain for those who are 2.5 years and beyond already living in the UK presently.
